onyomiExamples.meaning: danger, Chinese "rooftop" constellation (one of the 28 mansions)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: dangerous, risky, hazardous, perilous, precarious, in danger, in jeopardy, critical, grave, at risk, uncertain, unreliable, insecure, unsteady, doubtful, close (call), narrow (escape), look out!, watch out!, be careful!

kunyomiExamples.reading: あぶないはしをわたる
kunyomiExamples.meaning: to tread on thin ice, to go out on a limb, to walk a tightrope, to take risks, to cross a dangerous bridge
dangerous, in danger, facing imminent danger, precarious (situation), perilous (state, balance, etc.), in doubt, in jeopardy, uncertain, insecure, concerning, worrying
to fear, to doubt, to have misgivings about, to worry about, to be anxious about, to be apprehensive about
